sentences.sentence: How about "In America we trust" or "At least we're not French", or "Land of yobs(1) and morons(2)".
sentences.translation: 这几个怎么样：“我们信任美国”，“至少我们不是法国人”或者“无赖和笨蛋之都”。

sentences.sentence: Mindless yobs simply destroyed more than 100 years of history and trashed countless other small family businesses in this area for no good reason whatsoever.
sentences.translation: 那些没脑子的小无赖们毁了一个有100多年历史的古建筑，并无缘无故地破坏了本地区无数的小家族生意。
